name: Project Highway Racing
description:
Project Highway Racing is a free racing game available on PC and ANDROID (Google Play). In this game you can drive cars on a highway to earn money. You can upgrade your car to go faster, to handle and break better. Also, you can buy a turbo. You can customize it's color and rims. Unlock new maps and buy new cars with earned money. New maps will give you MORE MONEY and unlocked cars will go faster. This is a game made by two of us, so please download it and rate if you enjoy it.

Features:
- High detailated car models
- High detailated car interiors
- Customize your car with rims and paint colors
- Tune your car to go faster and to handle better
- Drive on sunny, night and snowy highways
- Unlock new maps and earn 2X and 3X MONEY.
- Improve your skills on racing on highway
- Cool music to listen to while driving

RACE THROUGH TRAFFIC
The main goal in the game is to race through traffic to earn score points and money.
Race in 3 different maps (more to come) and impove your skills to earn more.

HIGH DETAILED CARS
Drive high detailed cars, includes interior and exterior. Take a ride in low power cars, then
unlock some fast supercars that will year more points for you. We plan to add new cars in
the game with future updates.

UPGRADE YOUR CARS
Upgrade your cars to go faster, handle better and break better. Buy a turbo charger and NO2 to go even faster to earn more money.

UNLOCK DIFFERENT MAPS TO EARN MORE
Drive on sunny and snowy maps. You can also drive on a night map.
The unlocked maps will give you more money. Currently, for unlocking night map you will earn 2X MONEY, and for snowy map you will earn 3X MONEY.

CUSTOMIZE YOUR RIDE
Change the color and put some new rims on your car to make it look a little unique.

COOL MUSIC
Listen to cool music in garage and while driving.

Download Project Highway Racing for FREE and enjoy racing in traffic.
Please rate it and leave a comment.
